Category: Progam and Portables

Included Medicine

Operating Systems: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7 

Description 
PowerArchiver is the ultimate compression utilities. It combines the power of WinZip with support graph of the best image viewers. 

The list of potential compression of this program is endless: full support for ZIP, CAB, LHA (LZH), TAR (+ TAR.GZ, + TAR.BZ2) and BH (BlakHole), support for reading and extracting files RAR, ARJ, ARC, ACE, ZOO, GZIP and BZIP2. 

It also has multiple built-in utilities such as password management, possibility of comments, renaming files in the archive, installer files, checking for viruses, integrated viewer supports TXT, RTF, BMP, JPG (JPEG), GIF, ICO, WMF and EMF, sending e-mail, etc. 

PowerArchiver supports the following formats: 
Decompress: RAR, ARJ, ARC, ACE, ZOO plus ISO, BIN, IMG, NRG 
Reading and Writing: ZIP, 7-Zip (7z), CAB, LHA (LZH), TAR, GZIP, BZIP2, BH, XXE, UUE, yEnc, MIME 

  

Change History 

PowerArchiver 2011 Changes: 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Compatibility with Vista and UAC Windows 7 - first archiver to Completely integrate with Windows 7 and Vista, and offer true support for User Account Control (UAC). Do you want to compress or extract to folders That only Administrator can? No problem anymore - PowerArchiver 2011 will elevate to Administrator user Itself, first archiver to do so. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Full VSS support in Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7 - need to compress files That Are locked? Databases, Outlook emails, Anything That Is Not locked by Windows and understandable to By Any Other compression utility? PowerArchiver 2011 is first compression utility to using Volume Shadow Copy (VSS) and enable you to compress Any File on Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Faster startup - We Looked hard and optimized startup time for PowerArchiver 2011. Registered users will see at minimum 0.5s Difference between old older versions, and users with Slower computers will see much bigger diferencias.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Play sound when done - Plays sound eleven operation is done (pick Any tune you want!)

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improved File Manager - now with breadcrumb navigation bar for cutting easier, as in Windows 7. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Better support for large DPI - PowerArchiver 2011 windows and dialogues now Automatically adjust to larger font DPI. 
PowerArchiver 2011 Format support changes: 


ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Faster Unrar - Have Many RAR files? PowerArchiver 2011 has Fastest unrar engine on the planet, 10% Faster Than WinRar 4.0.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Better support TAR - You Can now compress and extract TAR files over 4 GB in size, and do it faster than ever before. Also dog PowerArchiver now compress and extract tar.xz format. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Better support ISO - ISO's Extract UDF, in Addition to ISO9660 Extracting files, Not Only That But it is now up to 2x faster than before. If You Are Pro user, You Can Also create Both UDF (unicode and over 4GB) and ISO9660 files. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Better 7-zip support - Create and Extract LZMA2 archives. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ LHA Better support - better support for Compressing and extracting LHA / LZH archives. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Added support for extracting multiple new formats: MSI, NSIS, CHM, DMG, RPM, CPIO, VHD, XAR, SquashFS, CramFS and WIM.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Completely new Secure FTP client - FTP Our client has-been rebuilt from Grounds up, Everything is 100% new. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Secure protocols added - Added support for SFTP, FTP with SSL and FTP with SSL / TLS protocols. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Integration with PowerArchiver - Upload files from archives to FTP and Download Them directly to file, Without Needing to unpack anything! 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Quick ZIP and Send - Single click button zips (your choice of formats) and selected file uploads. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Edit and update files - Continuously track multiple edited / opened Them files and update as needed. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Bandwidth Limiter - Used limit bandwidth with easy and visible option. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Ribbon interface - first FTP client with Microsoft Office licensed ribbon cutting easier interface for use (optional). 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Advanced Queuing system - with multiple transfers and global transfer limits. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Unique Folder queuing - are you uploading / downloading complete folder? Will Have FTP client to login only eleven for faster uploads downloads. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Disconnect or shutdown - After queue is completed, You Can Set It to disconnect from the server or your computer shutdown events. 
Data Burner PowerArchiver changes: 


ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Standalone Interface - From version 2011, You Can Start Burner Standalone Without Starting PowerArchiver. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Directly to Disc Copy Disc - You Can now copy Directly from Disc to Disc (CD, DVD, BluRay). 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ UDF support - Full support for UDF format disc burning That Supports Larger Than 4 GB files and unicode filenames. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improved Shell Extensions - Mount and unmount Virtual Drives from shell extensions directly. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Persistent Virtual Drives - Mount Virtudal persistently Drives So They stay mounted after computer restart events. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Close tray option - Automatically close tray after burning is done. 
PowerArchiver Backup changes: 


ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Full support VSS - Backup Any File on Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7, HAVING Without Something to worry if it is using. With this feature, Enterprise class Becomes PowerArchiver Backup Backup tool and Stock That Can compress database on your computer. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Secure FTP support - backup to SFTP, FTP with SSL and FTP with SSL / TLS secure ftp servers. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Better Burning support - backup files larger and close disc tray after burning is done. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improvement in speed - faster backups for larger files
